caller_intent: The caller wants to reinstate their general liability insurance for their business, Mark Wyatt DBA First Quality Shutters and Blindings.
resolution_steps: Agent Gloria confirms the caller's business name and attempts to locate the account using the phone number and policy number.
Agent discovers the policy was canceled on August 21st, over 30 days ago, making reinstatement ineligible.
Agent explains that the policy must be rewritten instead of reinstated and mentions the need to set up EFT (Electronic Funds Transfer).
Agent offers to consult with a manager and call the caller back with next steps.
knowledge_required: Insurance reinstatement rules (e.g., 30-day window for reinstatement)
summary: The caller sought to reinstate a canceled general liability policy, but the agent determined it was too late (over 30 days past cancellation). The agent explained the need for a policy rewrite and EFT setup, then offered to consult with a manager and follow up.
